title: Let's be friends? maybe ?
content: so I'm a first year student and its been like like two weeks college started , I see people having group of friends and here I am , can't make a good friend , there is too much crowd in PES but why am I not able to make friends , if someone is facing the similar  issue . I just wanna say let's be friends ... Now don't come at me like "ohh pick me girl" I actually just wanna make friends and have a good college life.

comments.body: Are you looking for friends that are studying in PES or just anyone?

I mean I don't mind , I would love to have friends outside PES too , I also just hope I make few in college too   to talk to or walk around with , sit together in lunch , but yes if you wanna be friends even if you are not in college , let's be friends (≧∇≦)

I'll also be starting college soon. So we'll have something in common.

I'm also down to be friends. So if you're fine with it, let's connect through DMs.
Sure , please DM me , we can talk there
I'm down for it,  wanna be friends?
Yessss , let's be friends
Woah!! Hold on so college has already started for you guys??
I'm not a engineering student so yes
What are you majoring in?
Computer application
I wanna be friends
Let's be friends *while dancing like a frog* because I'm happy
Yayyyyy

It’ll take a while to acclimatise. You’ll get to join some clubs and labs. In the mean time, I suggest you start looking into the upcoming events and see how you can participate and contribute. 

Start approaching your seniors right away! It’ll help for sure!  

Have a good one!
Thanks for the advice , I have already tried approaching seniors , it isn't helping much RN , but yeah I guess it will be fine by time
Me too I’m also gonna start my university maybe this month or next month..
I'm down
At PES or somewhere else?
Yesss girly , let's text in the DMS
R u dng bca
Let's go, new friend silly fish fucker
Yessss , are in class RN ? Because I am
Yeeeee boiiii ,  which course are you from ?
Yeeeee boiiii ,  which course are you from ?
I didn’t my mca in pes and i know all teachers so i asked you
yess!! hi friend
Hieeeee , wassup
No I’m not from Bangalore at all but I’m also gonna join this month. I am from AP and my university is (Andhra University)..
Ohh cool
Yeah sure , I might actually get pes through kcet . You might be busy currently replying to all those other dms 😂. So reply when possible.
Chill dude , everyone else is busy with class , I'm in class rn
So u a gorl huh?
Mmmmhhh yummy 👄
bruh u scared me I thought college started and I've been absent all this while. does anyone know when btech starts? also I'm down to be friends
Yes I'm a gorl
Lol sorry to scare you and Yes let's be friends , so when is your classes starting ?
idk yet, yesterday I got a mail from pes saying that the last day to give up ur seat was 17th, so sometime after that I suppose
Well well , we can hangout when you come here then
are u in rr campus or ec?
RR

I'm not from PESU-
But yea class good
🤣🤣🤣🤣 okey , I just had 3hrs of class
cool, sem
I'm also in first year
cool cool
What course u doin? How was the class

Yes we can be friends😊
Which course did u take?
Sure we can be friends😊
we can be friends too!
Yesssssss we can
Okey we are friends now , no turning back 🔪
BCA and the class was hell boring but thanks to the coffee I survived

A girl on reddit, nahh

Girls are not real
💀 are you commenting while being high ?

No💀

Ig you are not in jeeneetards sub
If you were in that sub, you prolly would have known  why girls are not real 

But that's OK, sorry for the inconvenience
Chill dude ,you don't have to be sorry
Meet you on 28th then!
Can't wait to see you , I finally have friends , crying happy tears
can you DM me your Instagram I'd if u have one?
LETSSS go W cofee
L sir
I don't believe you, prove it
How about you prove me you have a brain first ? Split open it and present it to me
You sound stupid honestly
Ey look I ain't stupid, I'm just retarded
I can tell
Coming from someone named "sillyfishfucker" this really hurts my feelings 😥
Lol non-retarded fish fucker looking for friends on a subr. Enough guys in BCA to give you attention, go there.
Here comes another retard , some wise person said " if you can't say something nice , don't say at all "
Seems like you really need to get a life , I pity you , if trying to being mean to others help your mental health , I don't mind it , god bless you
Man, u the one who attacked me 💀

Lol replying you by saying I'm actually a girl , was attacking you , funny , which countries princess as you ? I have not been rude to anyone who commented on my post but yes if someone come at me I'm not gonna take that .
Who takes offense to that? that was a genuine question, aight sorry for the misunderstanding
Also I'm sorry for calling you a silly fish fucker, like a wise fish once said " fish are friends with benefits, not food"
Are you in PES ? If you are I would like to see you someday , then you can decide my gender okey ?
Get downvoted lol
Nah but who looks for friends like this? Maybe you gotta learn to talk to people in real life
LOL don't be jealous now , kid .... I wish I cared being up voted or down voted , jokes on you
Hahaha even that guy isn't as mad at you ! ... Who hurt you ? Doreamon ! ... You sound as Petty as a 12 year old
Yesss, I am in pes , and maybe frame the second question a little less sus pls 🙂
You understood na ? Thats enough 😭😭
Aight one last question,  do u like Taylor swift?
I like her songs !
Uh oh u answered incorrectly, now u have to listen to all of taylor Swifts songs (my version), may God have mercy on ur eardrums 🙏
I'm willing to , you will definitely sound better than my programming professor
Oh you poor girl, u have no idea what ur in for, I will shed a tear just for you
Hahahaha you should meet my teacher then you will know
Damn now I'm curious, what's this dudes name?
I will let you know tomorrow morning , because I forgot her name
Aight gimme ur insta or something so I can ~~stalk you~~ engage you in profound conversations
Hahahaha , okey DM me lol
Yea today was my first day
do you like raisins
I don't
what about carrots
Hey are you discord :') send me I also want friends
I don't really use discord :(
